ygData.subject: Re: Deepwater Gobs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I must say I was working the DW goblins last night with a shaman friend of mine.  I killed about 15 of them, no helm, using the tactics above, we could
ygData.messageBody:
> DW Gobs - are hard to pull singles - unless you are level 50. So get some
> help or maybe try this idea that was posted a while back (by Harmonic):
>
> Go to Lake Rathe (why I cant say except maybe roaming singles can be found
> there?) Get levitate and SoW. Track (ok have ranger friend track) DW
> gobbies. Get right on top of them and agro them with Chords or other AE
> song. Run for the zone. Have a ranger cast snare on one and zone out then
> right back in. Find the snared one and kill him. Pray that he has a helm
> and that you wont have to repeat this 20 times.

I must say I was working the DW goblins last night with a shaman
friend of mine. I killed about 15 of them, no helm, using the
tactics above, we could handle 4 DW goblins at once, very hurt
after battle. DW goblins are wizards, clerics, or warriors.
I got experience from 2 of the 15 in group, if that indicates
anything about their raw power. I couldn't break the spawn,
they spawn way too quickly, and were always available when I went
out to collect them. I usually got one at a time, but that got
boring so I farmed them in groups. Still no helm, sigh. Sorry
Kenross.

Harmonic.
